sentences.sContent: A pretty scarf was loosely knotted around her neck.
sentences.sCn: 她的脖子上松松地系着一条漂亮的围巾。

sentences.sContent: ...Chinese knot is believed to bring good luck as well as ward off evil spirits...

synos.tran: （绳等的）结；节瘤，疙瘩；海里/小时（航速单位）

phrases.pCn: 难题；戈尔迪之结（希腊神话中的一个难题）

words.tran: 棘手的，难解决的；[木] 多节的；有结的

trans.tranOther: to tie together two ends or pieces of string, rope, cloth etc
a hard round place in a piece of wood where a branch once joined the tree
to tie together two ends or pieces of string, rope, cloth etc
